msg.msgText:
This command closes IBM MessageSight client connections The connections to close are specified by using one or more connection identifiers. Use this command only when you certain that one or more connections need to be closed.
SYNTAX: imaserver close Connection help imaserver close Connection "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver close Connection "ClientID=TestClient"
One or more of the following items can be specified to identify connection(s): ClientID Specifies the client ID of the connection or connections to close ClientAddress Specifies the client IP address of the connection or connections to close UserID Specifies the user ID of the connection or connections to close
NOTE: All "Key=value" pairs must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
